Text:
Thanks so much for these! You're doing a great job that many of us appreciate. I'm really enjoying hearing these albums again, as I own them only on vinyl and I don't currently have a working turntable.

Will you be uploading Genesis Live, from 1973, and Seconds Out?

Thank you!
I don`t have the remastered Live and Seconds Out but do have the 1994 "Definitive Editions" Will put these up if you like.
That would be very kind of you. Thank you, from a Canadian fan!
Will be getting the Live Remasters next week so watch this space!
